description: Demonstrates the "yes-no" process - a dynamic method of assertiveness training - with a group of intellectually handicapped people. Shows participants in a workshop going through discussion sessions and experiential exercises exploring issues such as victimisation, making oneself understood, self-esteem, personal strength and sex education. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
